name: CLN Java Developer
description:
We are looking for a high-motivated developer with a positive attitude to join our team.

Cloudlinux Network(CLN) is a high-loaded cloud-based platform based on Kotlin and Java8(partially) developed according to microservices architecture principles. CLN is used by sales, marketing, support to bill customers, manage products and plans, access control to product updates and manage customers licenses. CLN is used by customers to register their products, pay for products and so on.

Work is fully remote, with flexible hours, so you can plan your day and work from anywhere in the world.

We are a company, who has been working remotely for 6 years, and we know how to do it right.

You can find more details about the company on our website Cloudlinux.com.

Join us to make the difference!


Responsibilities:

  • Participating in daily stand-ups, planning and other specific meetings
  • New features implementation
  • Code review
  • Bug fixing
  • Support activities


Must have:

  • 2+ years of experience of commercial development on Java(or Kotlin)
  • Spring boot 2
  • JPA(Hibernate) and SQL, Postgre
  • Hands-on experience with microservice architecture development
  • Payment providers integration experience
  • Docker basic knowledge


Will be a plus:

  • Kotlin
  • Kafka
  • Kubernetes
  • Experience with splitting monolith app to microservices

What’s in it for you?

  • A great opportunity for professional development within a young and fast-growing company
  • Interesting and challenging projects
  • Remote work on a full-time basis under a long-term contract
  • Compensation in US dollars
  • Flexible working hours
  • Paid one month vacation per year and sick leaves
  • Days off on national holidays
  • Medical insurance
  • Coworking compensation
  • English Language training
  • Challenging tasks
  • Knowledge-Exchange

Let’s make it a win-win for you and CloudLinux. Do not put off until later -- apply today and our team will gladly welcome you.
